name: Tanks Multiplayer on Steam - Tech Demo
name_original: Tanks Multiplayer on Steam - Tech Demo
description:
This is a simple real time strategy game that uses Mirror and the Steamworks API to allow online multiplayer through the Steam client and Steam user friends list. This tech demo was built as a learning experience for working with the Steam API to use in future projects and there is no further development planned. The project includes a lobby system, Steam friend compatibility, and Steamworks relay feature that allows a player to host a game without having to port forward their router or reveal their IP to other players.

The game involves players building structures with resources to spawn different kinds of tanks to destroy enemy structures. Be the last player with a base standing to win! (Up to 4 players)

To play the current version of the game, register the CStrat executable as a game in your steam library and invite your friends who have done the same using the steam friends list.
